author: Simon Difford
description: Arguably, when numbering my fruit cups, I left the best till last. (I skipped number 16 because the number 7 so befits a Tennessee whiskey-based cocktail). If using a 40% alc./vol. Tennessee whiskey (as opposed to a higher alc./vol. special bottling) then this recipe benefits from an extra splash (5ml (1/6oz) to 10ml (1/3oz). Tennessee whiskey adds an appealing sweet toasty note to this fruit cup.
name: Tennessee Whiskey Fruit Cup (Difford's Cup No.17)
recipeIngredient: 50 ml Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)

recipeInstructions.text: Add a citrus slice and a couple of mint leaves from garnish before filling to brim with ice
